SQL.LOAD: SELECT po_line_id, invoice_line_id, qty, amount, extended_qty, extended_uom, extended_unit_price, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, ap_payment_batch_id, match_type_xcd, invoice_matching_id FROM elp_ap_invoice_matching WHERE invoice_matching_id = :invoice_matching_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_ap_invoice_matching SET po_line_id = :po_line_id, invoice_line_id = :invoice_line_id, qty = :qty, amount = :amount, extended_qty = :extended_qty, extended_uom = :extended_uom, extended_unit_price = :extended_unit_price, ap_payment_batch_id = :ap_payment_batch_id, match_type_xcd = :match_type_xcd, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE invoice_matching_id = :invoice_matching_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_ap_invoice_matching ( po_line_id, invoice_line_id, qty, amount, extended_qty, extended_uom, extended_unit_price, ap_payment_batch_id, match_type_xcd, created_by, invoice_matching_id ) VALUES ( :po_line_id, :invoice_line_id, :qty, :amount, :extended_qty, :extended_uom, :extended_unit_price, :ap_payment_batch_id, :match_type_xcd, :created_by, :invoice_matching_id )
